Object.Field:
Author: Oracle Usa Inc. Version: 9.3.1.1 Last Update: August 27th, 2007
Description : - Integration Knowledge Module to load metadata into Hyperion Essbase
Name of the Rules file to be used for metadata load.
(Optional) Rule separator specified in the Rules file. Valid Values - Comma - Tab - Space - Custom character; for example, @, #, ^

Performs the restructure operation on the outline after a metadata load.
The valid values are: - DISCARD_ALL_DATA - KEEP_ALL_DATA - KEEP_INPUT_DATA - KEEP_LEVEL0_DATA
Flag to indicate if logging should be performed during the load process. If set to Yes, logging would be done to the file specified by the LOG_FILE_NAME option.
The fully qualified name of the file into which logging is to be done.
MAXL Script to be executed before loading Metadata to the Essbase Cube.
Abort on pre load maxl error
This option would be applicable only if user specifies PRE_LOAD_MAXL script. Aborts the load process on encountering any error while executing pre-maxl script.
Execute MAXL script after data load
MAXL Script to be executed after loading data in the Essbase Cube.
Specify the name of the file into which the error records should be logged.

<% if ("C".equals(snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_METHOD"))) { %> /* Consistant journalization detected. */ /* Lock should be done by a specific step in a package */ <% } else { %> update <%=snpRef.getTable( "L" , "JRN_NAME" , "A" )%> set JRN_CONSUMED = '1' where (1=1) <%=snpRef.getJrnFilter()%> <% } %>

from java.util import HashMap from java.lang import Boolean from java.lang import Integer from com.hyperion.odi.common import ODIConstants from com.hyperion.odi.connection import HypAppConnectionFactory
# # Target planning connection properties # serverName = "<%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DSERV_NAME")%>" userName = "<%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>" password = "<%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_PASS")%>" application = "<%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_CATALOG")%>" database = "<%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_SCHEMA")%>"
portStr = "1423" srvportParts = serverName.split(':',2) srvStr = srvportParts[0]
if(len(srvportParts) > 1): portStr = srvportParts[1]
# # Put the connection properites and initialize the esbase loader # targetProps = HashMap() targetProps.put(ODIConstants.SERVER,srvStr) targetProps.put(ODIConstants.PORT,portStr) targetProps.put(ODIConstants.USER,userName) targetProps.put(ODIConstants.PASSWORD,password) targetProps.put(ODIConstants.APPLICATION_NAME,application) targetProps.put(ODIConstants.DATABASE_NAME,database) targetProps.put(ODIConstants.WRITER_TYPE,ODIConstants.METADATA_WRITER)
print "Initalizing the essbase wrapper and connecting" pWriter = HypAppConnectionFactory.getAppWriter(HypAppConnectionFactory.APP_ESSBASE, targetProps);
rulesFile = r"<%=snpRef.getOption("RULES_FILE")%>" rulesSeparator = r"<%=snpRef.getOption("RULE_SEPARATOR")%>" logEnabled = <%=snpRef.getOption("LOG_ENABLED")%> logFileName = r"<%=snpRef.getOption("LOG_FILE_NAME")%>" preMaxlScript = r"<%=snpRef.getOption("PRE_LOAD_MAXL_SCRIPT")%>" postMaxlScript = r"<%=snpRef.getOption("POST_LOAD_MAXL_SCRIPT")%>" abortOnPreMaxlError = <%=snpRef.getOption("ABORT_ON_PRE_MAXL_ERROR")%> restructureDatabase = "<%=snpRef.getOption("RESTRUCTURE_DATABASE")%>" errFileName = r"<%=snpRef.getOption("ERROR_LOG_FILENAME")%>"
# set the load options loadOptions = HashMap() loadOptions.put(ODIConstants.RULES_FILE, rulesFile) loadOptions.put(ODIConstants.RULE_SEPARATOR, rulesSeparator) loadOptions.put(ODIConstants.LOG_ENABLED, Boolean(logEnabled)) loadOptions.put(ODIConstants.LOG_FILE_NAME, logFileName) loadOptions.put(ODIConstants.PRE_LOAD_MAXL_SCRIPT,preMaxlScript) loadOptions.put(ODIConstants.POST_LOAD_MAXL_SCRIPT,postMaxlScript) loadOptions.put(ODIConstants.ABORT_ON_PRE_MAXL_ERROR,Boolean(abortOnPreMaxlError)) loadOptions.put(ODIConstants.RESTRUCTURE_DATABASE,restructureDatabase); loadOptions.put(ODIConstants.ERROR_LOG_FILENAME, errFileName)
#call begin load pWriter.beginLoad(loadOptions)

from com.hyperion.odi.common import ODIConstants from com.hyperion.odi.connection import HypAppConnectionFactory from java.lang import Class from java.lang import Boolean from java.sql import * from java.util import HashMap # # Get the select statement on the staging area: # sql= """select <%=odiRef.getPop("DISTINCT_ROWS") %> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[EXPRESSION] [ALIAS_SEP] \u0022[COL_NAME]\u0022", ",", "", "INS and !TRG") %> from <%=odiRef.getFrom() %> where (1=1) <%=odiRef.getFilter() %> <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter() %> <%=odiRef.getJoin() %> <%=odiRef.getGrpBy() %> <%=odiRef.getHaving() %>"""
srcCx = odiRef.getJDBCConnection("SRC")
stmt = srcCx.createStatement()
srcFetchSize=<?if("".equals(odiRef.getInfo("SRC_FETCH_ARRAY"))){out.print("1000");}else{out.print(odiRef.getInfo("SRC_FETCH_ARRAY"));}?>
stmt.setFetchSize(srcFetchSize)
rs = stmt.executeQuery(sql)
#load the data stats = pWriter.loadData(rs)
#close the database result set, connection rs.close() stmt.close()
statString = stats.toString() raise "Essbase Metadata Writer Load Summary", statString

<% if ("C".equals(snpRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_METHOD"))) { %> /* Consistant journalization detected. */ /* Lock should be done by a specific step in a package */ <% } else { %> delete from <%=snpRef.getTable("L","JRN_NAME","A")%> where JRN_CONSUMED = '1' <%=snpRef.getJrnFilter()%> <% } %>
